text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Riverbank, California |settlement_type = City |nickname = |motto = City of Action |image_skyline = DowntownRiverbank.JPG |image_caption = Downtown Riverbank (Third Street) |image_flag = |image_seal = |image_shield = |image_map = Stanislaus_County_California_Incorporated_and_Unincorporated_areas_Riverbank_Highlighted.svg |mapsize = 250x200px |map_caption = Location in Stanislaus County and the state of California |image_map1 = |mapsize1 = |map_caption1 = |pushpin_map = USA |pushpin_map_caption = Location in the United States |pushpin_relief = 1 |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = |subdivision_type1 = State |subdivision_name1 = |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = Stanislaus |government_footnotes = |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |leader_title1 = |leader_name1 = |leader_title2 = |leader_name2 = |leader_title3 = |leader_name3 = |leader_title4 = |leader_name4 = |established_title = Incorporated |established_date = August 23, 1922 |area_magnitude = | unit_pref = Imperial | area_footnotes = | area_total_sq_mi = 4.10 | area_land_sq_mi = 4.07 | area_water_sq_mi = 0.03 | area_total_km2 = 10.61 | area_land_km2 = 10.54 | area_water_km2 = 0.07 | area_water_percent = 0.59 |population_as_of = 2020 |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_total = 24865 |population_density_km2 = auto |population_density_sq_mi = auto |population_metro = |timezone = Pacific (PST) |utc_offset = -8 |timezone_DST = PDT |utc_offset_DST = -7 |coordinates = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = 43 |elevation_ft = 86 |postal_code_type = ZIP code |postal_code = 95367 |area_code = 209 |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = |blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = |website = |footnotes = }} Riverbank is a city in Stanislaus County, California. According to the 2020 census, there are 24,865 living there. Since the city's formation in August 23, 1922, its official slogan is "City of Action." It is part of the Modesto Metropolitan Statistical Area. == References == Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in Stanislaus County, California
